about_the_game:
Bianca's father is a myth buster who had to go on a long trip and asked his daughter to clean the house, especially the attic. When she did that, she found a strange old camera and used it to take pictures everywhere. What could be a normal experience turned upside down when she noticed something weird: the pictures showed something her father always told her about and she never truly believed: spirits from the underworld.

Instead of being frightened, Bianca thought that was incredible until one of the creatures that Bianca photographed didn't like Bianca's new interest and decided to do anything so that Bianca deleted her photos, including spending a week pretending to be her best friend. Will she convince Bianca? Could Bianca find true love within a week? Time to discover it by playing a cute and short yuri furry kinect novel about girls and love.

💛 A short and cute yuri story to warm your heart;
💛 Kineck story with an Auto feature;
💛 Furry CG-art;
💛 Steam achievements;
💛 Duration: One hour less;

About the Game

Bianca's father is a myth buster who had to go on a long trip and asked his daughter to clean the house, especially the attic. When she did that, she found a strange old camera and used it to take pictures everywhere. What could be a normal experience turned upside down when she noticed something weird: the pictures showed something her father always told her about and she never truly believed: spirits from the underworld.

Instead of being frightened, Bianca thought that was incredible until one of the creatures that Bianca photographed didn't like Bianca's new interest and decided to do anything so that Bianca deleted her photos, including spending a week pretending to be her best friend. Will she convince Bianca? Could Bianca find true love within a week? Time to discover it by playing a cute and short yuri furry kinect novel about girls and love.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 Capable GPU
  • Storage: 230 MB available space

short_description: A cute and short furry yuri kinect visual novel about a rabbit who falls in love with a demon and both experience their first love.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
